Hi, thanks for stopping by! I haven’t gotten to seriously updating this page yet, but this is the gist:

Goby is a desktop application for organizing files and ideas. Here is an introduction to what the project is about. You can learn more in this Are.na channel, which I regularly update with work in progress. Currently, I’m preparing Goby for a pre-alpha release — contact me if you are interested in testing, or have any questions. :^)

— Nico

***

Goby started as a web extension for adding metadata to Are.na blocks, and I plan to maintain this tool as well. You can get started using the Are.na extension in one of your channels by entering the channel URL below.

Currently supported metadata fields:

  • Short text strings
  • Longform text w/ markdown
  • URLs
  • Tags
